item.title: Dumped Blog Ideas
item.author: 152334H
item.description: Despite the dead appearance of this blog, I actually think about it surprisingly often! Over the years, I’ve written a number of draft blogs or summaries that I simply ended up dumped at varying stages of completion.

item.title: Recent ML Projects
item.author: 152334H
item.description:
2 months ago, I was halfway into publishing a series on my TTS project. Today, the site for that project is defunct, and no new posts have been made about it.

What happened?
